abstract: New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo's administration announces agreement under which Nutraloaf, dish widely hated by prisoners, will no longer be served in solitary confinement as part of disciplinary rules; change is part of number of adjustments to solitary confinement policy.
lead_paragraph: The discontinuation of Nutraloaf, an unappetizing brick of dissimilar ingredients given to inmates in solitary confinement, is a symbolic victory for those seeking more humane treatment for prisoners.

headline.main: New York Prisons Take an Unsavory Punishment Off the Table
headline.print_headline: Called Unsavory, a Punishment Is Off the Table at State Prisons

snippet: The discontinuation of Nutraloaf, an unappetizing brick of dissimilar ingredients given to inmates in solitary confinement, is a symbolic victory for those seeking more humane treatment for prisoners.
